text: Kirsti Biermann (born 2 August 1950) is a Norwegian speed skater, born in Oslo. She competed at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, where she placed 8th in 500 m and 9th in 1000 m. She participated in four competitions at the 1972 Winter Olympics in Sapporo. She is the sister of speed skater Tone Biermann. == References == == External links == * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Norwegian female speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of Norway Category:Speed skaters at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Speed skaters at the 1972 Winter Olympics
title: Kirsti Biermann
